Package mru.game.view

Class AppMenu

java.lang.Object
mru.game.view.AppMenu
public class AppMenu extends Object
This Class can be called to display menus Methods take parameters from puntoBancoGame
Author:
Reese

  • Constructor Details

    • AppMenu

      public AppMenu()

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public int showMenu()
      displays the main menu of the application
      Returns:
      0 if selection is play, 1 if selection is search, 2 if selection exit, 3 if invalid input

    • showMenu2

      public int showMenu2()
      shows menu 2 called if search option is chosen in menu 1 validates input
      Returns:
      0 if selection is back to main menu, 1 if selection is show top players, if selection is search by name

    • showTopPlayers

      public void showTopPlayers(ArrayList<Player> topPlayers)
      Shows table of top players
      Parameters:
      topPlayers - list of players ranked by wins from gameManager

    • searchPlayer

      public void searchPlayer(Player p)
      Searches for player tells the user if the player is not found
      Parameters:
      players - list of players from GameManager

    • enterName

      public String enterName()
      prompts the user to enter a name
      Returns:
      a String of the name the user wants to input

    • showWelcome

      public void showWelcome(String name, Boolean newPlayer, double balance)
      shows welcome when player enters a new game
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the player to be displayed
      newPlayer - if the player is playing for the first time different messages will be displayed
      balance - of the player

    • showGuess

      public int showGuess()
      displayes menu for player to guess on the outcome of the game prompts for input from the user validates input
      Returns:
      0 if they think the player will win, 1 if they think that the banker will win, 2 if they think it will be a tie

    • showBet

      public double showBet(double balance)
      Asks the player how much they would like to bet validates input
      Parameters:
      p - to ensure the player has the money to make the bet
      Returns:
      a double of the amount to bet

    • askPlayAgain

      public Boolean askPlayAgain()
      asks the player if they would like to play again validates input
      Returns:
      true if they wish to continue playing, false if they wish to exit

    • showBoard

      public void showBoard(int result, double bet, ArrayList<Card> playerHand, int playerPoints, ArrayList<Card> bankerHand, int bankerPoints)
      displays the outcome of the game and bet all parameters from PuntoBancoGame called by GameManager after game is played then prompts calls askPlayAgain
      Parameters:
      result - of the game type integer
      bet - the player made type double
      playerHand - hand of the player after game type Card ArrayList
      playerPoints - points of the player after game type integer
      bankerHand - hand of the banker after game type Card ArrayList
      bankerPoints - point of the banker after the game type integer
